document.full_text: an e. coli outbreak linked to contaminated cucumbers that has killed 14 people and made more than 300 seriously ill in germany has spread to other north european countries and is expected to worsen in the coming week.
document.title: germany e.coli cucumber death toll rises to 14
lines_and_colors: an e. coli outbreak linked to contaminated cucumbers that has killed 14 people and made more than 300 seriously ill in germany has spread to other north european countries and is expected to worsen in the coming week.
